title: rito help
body:
I was wondering how to sign up for pbe testing ive had friends say that i need high honor  and i have honor five but i dont know how to sign up, Help me plis rito.
 love you -maddrapp

replies.body: You should be able to sign up directly at the[ PBE Site](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe)!
